title: Data Quality SQL Operator: FUZZY_MATCH
sql:
WITH testdata as (select 'Gemini Partners' as text_a, 
                         'Gemmini Partners' as text_b)
SELECT substr(text_a, 1, 13) as text_a,
       fuzzy_match(WHOLE_WORD_MATCH, text_a, text_b) WWM,
       fuzzy_match(WHOLE_WORD_MATCH, text_a, text_b, EDIT_TOLERANCE 15) EWWM
  FROM testdata;

TEXT_A           WWM    EWWM 
________________ ______ _______ 
Gemini Partne        50     100
